reviewText: This game is a pretty terrible HOG. Mainly due to tacky graphics, poor voice overs and some non responsive lags. I have to end up using the solve button for puzzles as they offer no hint buttons. I am a avid HOG player and this one is a big miss in my book.

reviewText:
Game is worth it when on special. Requires 2 play throughs to get all in game achivements. More adventure than hidden object. Overall - Good fun.

Pros:
Good Puzzles
Easy Gameplay

Cons:
Achivements are not linked to steam
Weird story
